CustomField.formula:
IF ( Negoptim__Is_Tariff_Condition__c = TRUE,
Negoptim__Base_TO_Tariff_Nego__c * Negoptim__Value_per__c/100, Negoptim__Base_TO_Nego__c * Negoptim__Value_per__c/100 )
+ (Negoptim__Value_amt__c - IF(Negoptim__Is_Excluded_To_Nego_Base_F__c,IF(Negoptim__Exclusion_to_Nego_Base_Value__c==0,Negoptim__Value_amt__c,Negoptim__Exclusion_to_Nego_Base_Value__c) ,0))* IF( Negoptim__Base_TO_Nego_YearBase__c <> 0 && Negoptim__Is_Yearly_Condition__c, Negoptim__Base_TO_Nego__c /Negoptim__Base_TO_Nego_YearBase__c, 1)
+ Negoptim__Base_Quantity_Nego__c * Negoptim__unit_amount__c
CustomField.label: YTD Nego
